Class V2Utils

java.lang.Object
gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils.V2Utils
public class V2Utils extends Object
Utilities for manipulating V2 messages for FHIR Conversion

  • Method Details

    • addField

      public static <F extends org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Type> void addField(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Segment pid, int fieldNo, Class<F> clazz, Consumer<F> adder)
      Convenience method to add a single field to a resource Use: 
                      addField(pid, 4, patient, Identifier.class, patient::addIdentifier);
      Instead of: 
              Type t = getField(pid, 4);
        Identifier ident = DatatypeConverter.toIdentifier(t);
        if (ident != null && !ident.isEmpty()) {
                patient.addIdentifier(ident);
        }
      Type Parameters:
      F - The FHIR type to add
      Parameters:
      pid - The segment from which the value comes
      fieldNo - The field from which the value comes
      clazz - The datatype to create from the field
      adder - The adder function

    • addField

      public static <R extends org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Resource, F extends org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Type> void addField(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Segment pid, int fieldNo, Class<F> clazz, R resource, BiConsumer<R,F> adder)
      Convenience method to add a single field to a resource Use: 
                      addField(pid, 7, patient, DateTimeType.class, this::addBirthDateTime);
      Instead of: 
              Type t = getField(pid, 7);
        DateTimeType dt = DatatypeConverter.toDateTimeType(t);
        if (dt != null && !dt.isEmpty()) {
                this.addBirthDateTime(patient, dt);
        }
      Type Parameters:
      F - The FHIR type to add
      R - The Resource to add it to
      Parameters:
      pid - The segment from which the value comes
      fieldNo - The field from which the value comes
      resource - The resource to add to
      clazz - The datatype to create from the field
      adder - The adder function

    • addFields

      public static <F extends org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Type> void addFields(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Segment pid, int fieldNo, Class<F> clazz, Consumer<F> adder)
      Convenience method to add a multiple fields to a resource Use: 
                      addFields(pid, 11, patient, Address.class, patient::addAddress);
      Instead of: 
              Type[] types = getFields(pid, 11);
        for (Type t: types) {
                Address addr = DatatypeConverter.toAddress(t);
                if (addr != null && !addr.isEmpty()) {
                        patient.addAddress(ident);
                }
        }
      Type Parameters:
      F - The FHIR type to add
      Parameters:
      pid - The segment from which the value comes
      fieldNo - The field from which the value comes
      clazz - The datatype to create from the field
      adder - The adder function

    • addFields

      public static <R extends org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Resource, F extends org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Type> void addFields(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Segment pid, int fieldNo, Class<F> clazz, R patient, BiConsumer<R,F> adder)
      Convenience method to add a multiple fields to a resource Use: 
                      addFields(pid, 10, patient, CodeableConcept.class, this::addRace);
      Instead of: 
              Type[] types = getField(pid, 10);
        for (Type t: types) {
                CodeableConcept cc = DatatypeConverter.toCodeableConcept(t);
                if (cc != null && !cc.isEmpty()) {
                        this.addRace(patient, cc);
                }
        }
      Type Parameters:
      R - The FHIR Resource to add
      F - The FHIR type to add
      Parameters:
      pid - The segment from which the value comes
      fieldNo - The field from which the value comes
      patient - The resource to add to
      clazz - The datatype to create from the field
      adder - The adder function

    • getField

      public static ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Type getField(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Segment segment, int field)
      Get the first occurrence of the specified field from an HL7 V2 segment.
      Parameters:
      segment - The segment to get the field for. This is a convenience method to get a field that does not throw exceptions the way that segment.getField() does.
      field - The field number
      Returns:
      The specified field, or null of the field does not exist or is empty.

    • getFields

      public static ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Type[] getFields(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Segment segment, int field)
      Get all occurrences of the specified field from an HL7 V2 segment.
      Parameters:
      segment - The segment to get the field for. This is a convenience method to get a field that does not throw exceptions the way that segment.getField() does.
      field - The field number
      Returns:
      An array containing all occurrences of the specified field.
